CARD_CREATE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} added the card {{cardTitle}} to the {{listName}} list.
CARD_DELETE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} deleted the card {{cardTitle}} from the list {{listName}}.
CARD_SET_DUE_DATE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} set the due date for the card {{cardTitle}} to {{dueDate}}.
CARD_REMOVE_DUE_DATE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} removed the due date from the card {{cardTitle}}.
CARD_ADD_ATTACHMENT: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} attached the file {{fileName}} to the card {{cardTitle}}.
CARD_REMOVE_ATTACHMENT: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} removed the file {{fileName}} from the card {{cardTitle}}.
CARD_ADD_CHECKLIST: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} added the checklist {{checklistName}} to the card {{cardTitle}}.
CARD_ADD_LABEL: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} added the label {{labelName}} to the card {{cardTitle}}.
CARD_REMOVE_LABEL: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} removed the label {{labelName}} from the card {{cardTitle}}.
CARD_DUPLICATE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} duplicated the card {{originalCardTitle}} to create the card {{newCardTitle}}.
CARD_UPDATE_DESCRIPTION: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} updated the description of the card {{cardTitle}}.
LIST_CREATE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} created the list {{listName}} in the board {{boardName}}.
LIST_CHANGE_COLOR: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} changed the color of the list {{listName}}.
BOARD_DUPLICATE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} duplicated the board {{originalBoardName}} to create the board {{newBoardName}}.
BOARD_UPDATE_DESCRIPTION: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} updated the description of the board {{boardName}}.
BOARD_DELETE: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} deleted the board {{boardName}} and {{listCount}} lists, {{cardCount}} cards.
USER_DELETE_ACCOUNT: {{actorFirstName}} {{actorLastName}} deleted their account. ({{boardCount}} boards, {{listCount}} lists, {{cardCount}} cards deleted)
